00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 // Data Structure for this object
00013 typedef struct _jcom_time{
00014         t_object        obj;
00015         void            *obex;
00016 } t_jcom_time;
00017 
00018 
00019 // Prototypes for methods
00020 void*   jcom_time_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00021 void    jcom_time_free(t_jcom_time *x);
00022 void    jcom_time_rewind(t_jcom_time *x);
00023 
00024 
00025 // Globals
00026 static t_class* jcom_time_class;
00027 
00028 
00029 /************************************************************************************/
00030 // Main() Function
00031 
00032 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00033 {
00034         t_class *c;
00035         
00036         jamoma_init();
00037 
00038         // Define our class
00039         c = class_new("jcom.time", (method)jcom_time_new, (method)jcom_time_free, 
00040                 sizeof(t_jcom_time), (method)NULL, A_GIMME, 0);
00041 
00042         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_jcom_time, obex));
00043 
00044         // Make methods accessible for our class:
00045         class_addmethod(c, (method)jcom_time_rewind,            "rewind",       0);
00046     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,     "dumpout",      A_CANT, 0);
00047         
00048         // Finalize our class
00049         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00050         jcom_time_class = c;
00051         return 0;
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 /************************************************************************************/
00056 // Object Life
00057 
00058 // Create
00059 void *jcom_time_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00060 {
00061         t_jcom_time *x = (t_jcom_time*)object_alloc(jcom_time_class);
00062         if(x){
00063                 object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (t_object*)outlet_new(x, NULL));
00064 
00065                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);                       
00066         }
00067         return x;
00068 }
00069 
00070 // Destroy
00071 void jcom_time_free(t_jcom_time *x)
00072 {       
00073         ;
00074 }
00075 
00076 /************************************************************************************/
00077 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00078 
00079 void jcom_time_rewind(t_jcom_time *x)
00080 {
00081         jamoma_scheduler_rewind(NULL);
00082 }
